description: Number of lines through exactly 4 points of an n X n grid of points.
links: S. Mustonen, On lines and their intersection points in a rectangular grid of points [From _Seppo Mustonen_, Apr 18 2009]
formula: 1/2 (f(n, 5) - 2 f(n, 4) + f(n, 3)) where f(n, k) = Sum ((n - |kx|)(n - |ky|)); -n<kx<n, -n<ky<n, (x, y)=1. [From _Seppo Mustonen_, Apr 18 2009]
author: _David W. Wilson_
